title: puttam pudu
sahitya:
puttam pudu vasantam sakhiyE pUttuk-kanindadaDI


anupallavi

  citra shOlaiyilE kalait-tEnuNDu pADiDuvOm sakhiyE mAnuDan ADiDuvOm


caraNam 1    veLLi malaiyininrE pongum veLLap-perukkinaip-pOl sakhiyE
uLLa guhaiyininrE pEribam tuLLi varugudaDI adai aLLip-parugiDuvOm
    caraNam 2    ashaiyum kATrinilE aruL maNam ADi varugudaDI sakhiyE
dishaiyellAm poliya azhagut-tIpparakkudaDI pADa nApparakkudaDI
    caraNam 3    Ugattait-tUNDudaDI ulagil uNmaip-poruL kANa dAhattait-
tUNDudaDI deiva mOhattait-tUNDudaDI shakti vEgattait-tUNDudaDI
